Organisation de l'espace aérien et procédures
EDGG FIR LANGEN FIR - EDMM FIR MUENCHEN FIR - EDWW FIR BREMEN FIR

    EDDZ-B0854/25
    DU: 21 11 2025 09:42 AU: 20 02 2026 23:59 EST
    A) EDGG EDMM EDWW
    Q) EDXX / QAFXX / IV / NBO / E / 000/999 / 5123N01019E262
    E) MILITARY INVASION OF UKRAINE BY RUSSIAN FEDERATION.
    REROUTINGS, EXTENDED ROUTE PORTIONS BELOW FL245 AND DELAY MAY BE
    EXPECTED WITHIN LOWER AND UPPER GERMAN AIRSPACE DUE TO AIRSPACE
    RESTRICTIONS FOR THE EXECUTION OF MILITARY MISSIONS.
    IT IS RECOMMENDED TO CONSIDER THE USE OF EXTRA-FUEL.

    ETCZ-U0076/25
    DU: 27 11 2025 00:01 AU: 26 02 2026 23:59
    A) EDGG EDMM EDWW
    Q) EDXX / QAFXX / IV / NBO / E / 000/999 / 5123N01018E999
    E) AAR JOJO ANCHOR
    GEMIL FLIP MAP
    PAGE 1. AIR REFUELLING ANCHORS,
    PAGE 1.4 JOJO ANCHOR

    EDDZ-B0065/26
    DU: 27 01 2026 14:43 AU: 27 04 2026 23:59
    A) EDGG EDMM EDWW
    Q) EDXX / QAFXX / IV / NBO / E / 000/999 / 5123N01019E262
    E) SECURITY - HAZARDOUS SITUATION IN SYRIA
    CIVIL GERMAN AIR OPERATORS ARE PROHIBITED TO ENTER FIR DAMASCUS
    (OSTT) BELOW FL260. POTENTIAL RISK FROM ANTI-AVIATION WEAPONRY,
    MILITARY OPERATIONS AND ARMED CONFLICTS.
    FURTHER INFORMATION: WEBSITE OF THE FEDERAL MINISTRY FOR DIGITAL
    AND TRANSPORT OF GERMANY (WWW.BMV.DE/KRISENMANAGEMENT).
    CIVIL GERMAN AIR OPERATORS ARE ADVISED TO TAKE POTENTIAL RISK
    INTO ACCOUNT IN THEIR RISK ASSESSMENT AND ROUTING DECISIONS WITHIN
    FIR DAMASCUS (OSTT) AT AND ABOVE FL260. POTENTIAL RISK TO AVIATION
    FROM MILITARY OPERATIONS.
    THIS NOTAM OVERRULES THE RECOMMENDATION PROVIDED IN THE CURRENTLY
    APPLICABLE AIC.

    A) EDGG EDWW EDMM
    Q) EDXX / QAFXX / IV / NBO / E / 000/999 / 5123N01019E262
    E) SECURITY - HAZARDOUS SITUATION IN IRAN
    CIVIL GERMAN AIR OPERATORS ARE RECOMMENDED NOT TO ENTER FIR TEHRAN
    (OIIX). POTENTIAL RISK TO AVIATION FROM ESCALATING CONFLICT AND
    ANTI-AVIATION WEAPONRY.
    THIS NOTAM OVERRULES THE RECOMMENDATION PROVIDED IN THE CURRENTLY
    APPLICABLE AIC.

    ETCZ-M0217/26
    DU: 23 01 2026 08:02 AU: 18 02 2026 23:59
    A) EDMM EDGG EDWW
    Q) EDXX / QAFXX / V / NBO / E / 000/999 / 5123N01018E999
    E) REF ACHAD NO 355 (DEU) / NO 303 (PL) / NO 141 (NL).
    TFC(L) NM 32-1 ESSEN - EDITION 46 (INC ACHAD 350)
    VERTICAL OBSTRUCTIONS
    CHANGE TO READ:
    AMEND: W/M/L 51 44 29 N 007 05 50 E 1048 MSL 800 AGL
    TO READ: W/M/L 52 48 03 N 008 31 33 E 1064 MSL 821 AGL
    INTO
    AMEND: W/M/L 51 44 29 N 007 05 50 E 1048 MSL 800 AGL
    TO READ: W/M/L 51 44 29 N 007 05 50 E 1064 MSL 821 AGL
    AND ADD FOLLOWING AREA:
    WINDPOWER AREA LIT / OFFSHORE WINPOWER AREA
    FOR DETAILED INFORMATION SEE TFC(L) DIGITAL AT WWW.MILAIS.LUFT
    AMEND:
    W/A/L 51 44 29 N 007 05 50 E.)

LIBB FIR BRINDISI FIR - LIMM FIR MILANO FIR - LIRR FIR ROMA FIR

    LIIA-E1428/25
    DU: 13 06 2025 17:27 AU: PERM
    A) LIBB LIMM LIRR
    Q) LIXX / QAFXX / IV / NBO / E / 000/188 / 4119N01321E999
    E) FIREFIGHTING ACTIVITY IS REGULATED AS FLW:
    -AIRCRAFT NOT INVOLVED IN FIREFIGHTING OPERATIONS MUST NOT
    FLY OVER THE FIRE AREA AND MUST EXERCISE EXTREME CAUTION
    WHEN FLYING NEAR IT, CONSIDERING THE POSSIBLE INTERVENTION
    OF FIREFIGHTING ACFT.
    THEREFORE, WHEN AN AERIAL FIREFIGHTING OPERATION IS
    ANNOUNCED/ACTIVE, IT IS PROHIBITED TO FLY IN THE ZONES IDENTIFIED
    BY THE FIRE-FIGHTING AUTHORITIES AND NOTIFIED BY THE COMPETENT
    AUTHORITY OR, IN THE ABSENCE OF SPECIFIC PROVISIONS:
    I. WITHIN CONTROLLED AIRSPACE, IN THE ABSENCE OF SPECIFIC
    COMMUNICATIONS ABOUT THE AREA AFFECTED BY THE FIREFIGHTING
    OPERATIONS FROM THE ENGAGED ACFT, BELOW 760M (2500FT) AGL
    WITHIN AN AREA EXTENDING UP TO A HORIZONTAL DISTANCE OF 4KM
    (2 NM) FROM THE FIRE
    II. OUTSIDE CONTROLLED AIRSPACE, BELOW 900M (3000FT) AGL,
    WITHIN AN AREA EXTENDING UP TO A HORIZONTAL DISTANCE OF 9KM
    (5NM) FROM THE FIRE.
    -TIMELY UPDATES REGARDING THE ZONES AND AREAS AFFECTED
    CAN BE BROADCAST ON GROUND/AIR/GROUND FREQUENCIES.
    -THE ENGAGED FIREFIGHTING AIRCRAFT KEEP THE ATS UNIT
    RESPONSIBLE FOR THE AFFECTED AREA INFORMED ABOUT THE
    FIREFIGHTING OPERATIONS AND THEIR CONCLUSION.
    -THE ATS UNIT RESPONSIBLE FOR THE AREA AFFECTED BY THE
    FIREFIGHTING OPERATIONS PROVIDES AIR TRAFFIC SERVICES, AS FAR
    AS POSSIBLE:
    1.TO THE AIRCRAFT ENGAGED IN FIREFIGHTING OPERATIONS, EXCEPT
    IN THE FIREFIGHTING AREA WHERE IT PROVIDES ONLY FLIGHT INFORMATION
    AND ALERT SERVICES.
    RMK: IF A CTR IS AFFECTED BY THE FIRE, SID/STAR/INSTR APCH PROC COULD
    BE TEMPORARILY SUSPENDED OR MODIFIED
    2.TO OTHER GAT FLIGHTS, BASED ON THE INFORMATION AVAILABLE REGARDING
    THE FIREFIGHTING ACTIVITY, WHICH MAY STILL BE INCOMPLETE.
    REF AIP ENR 1.1.1.4 'POLICE, CUSTOMS AND PATROL FLIGHTS ENGAGED IN
    URGENCY MISSIONS', PARAGRAPH C 'FIREFIGHTING'

    LIIA-E1537/25
    DU: 26 06 2025 13:55 AU: 23 09 2025 23:59 EST
    A) LIBB LIMM LIRR
    Q) LIXX / QAFXX / IV / NBO / E / 000/999 / 4119N01321E999
    E) ITALIAN AIR CARRIERS AND CAPTAINS OF AIRCRAFT IN CHARGE OF AIR
    SERVICES OPERATED BY CARRIERS HOLDING AN OPERATING LICENSE
    ISSUED BY ITALY, WHETHER THEY ARE CONTRACTUAL CARRIERS AND/OR
    OPERATING CARRIERS, OR PERFORMING AIR SERVICES THROUGH A WET
    LEASE OR A CODESHARE AGREEMENT AS WELL AS FOR ANY FLIGHT MADE
    WITH AN AIRCRAFT REGISTERED IN ITALY SHALL EXERCISE ENHANCED
    CAUTION WHEN OVERFLYING NICOSIA FIR (LCCC) DUE TO MONTHLY PLANNED
    FIRING EXERCISES. IT IS REQUESTED TO CAREFULLY FOLLOW
    INSTRUCTIONS FROM CYPRUS AUTHORITIES PROVIDING AIR TRAFFIC
    MANAGEMENT AND TO PAY PARTICULAR ATTENTION TO RESTRICTIONS OR
    INTERDICTIONS PUBLISHED BY CYPRUS AUTHORITIES.

    LIIA-E2890/25
    DU: 16 12 2025 10:44 AU: 15 03 2026 23:59 EST
    A) LIBB LIMM LIRR
    Q) LIXX / QAFXX / IV / NBO / E / 000/999 / 4119N01321E999
    E) ITALIAN AIR CARRIERS AND CAPTAINS OF AIRCRAFT IN CHARGE OF AIR
    SERVICES OPERATED BY CARRIERS HOLDING AN OPERATING LICENSE
    ISSUED BY ITALY, WHETHER THEY ARE CONTRACTUAL CARRIERS AND/OR
    OPERATING CARRIERS, OR PERFORMING AIR SERVICES THROUGH A WET
    LEASE OR A CODESHARE AGREEMENT AS WELL AS FOR ANY FLIGHT MADE
    WITH AN AIRCRAFT REGISTERED IN ITALY WHEN PLANNING FLIGHT
    OPERATIONS WITHIN JEDDAH FIR (OEJD) ARE RECOMMENDED TO EXERCISE
    ENHANCED CAUTION AND TO FOLLOW INSTRUCTIONS FROM SAUDI
    AUTHORITIES PROVIDING AIR TRAFFIC MANAGEMENT PAYING PARTICULAR
    ATTENTION TO RESTRICTIONS OR INTERDICTIONS PUBLISHED WITH VERY
    SHORT NOTICE AND TO EASA SAFETY DIRECTIVES.

    LIIA-E2891/25
    DU: 16 12 2025 10:51 AU: 15 03 2026 23:59 EST
    A) LIBB LIMM LIRR
    Q) LIXX / QAFXX / IV / NBO / E / 000/999 / 4119N01321E999
    E) ITALIAN AIR CARRIERS AND CAPTAINS OF AIRCRAFT IN CHARGE OF
    AIR SERVICES OPERATED BY CARRIERS HOLDING AN OPERATING LICENSE
    ISSUED BY ITALY, WHETHER THEY ARE CONTRACTUAL CARRIERS AND/OR
    OPERATING CARRIERS, OR PERFORMING AIR SERVICES THROUGH A WET LEASE
    OR A CODESHARE AGREEMENT AS WELL AS FOR ANY FLIGHT MADE WITH
    AN AIRCRAFT REGISTERED IN ITALY SHALL NOT ENTER UIR KYIV UKBU,
    FIR LVIV UKLV, FIR KYIV UKBV, FIR DNIPROPETROVSK UKDV,
    FIR SIMFEROPOL UKFV, FIR ODESA UKOV, FIR ROSTOV NA DONU URRV.
    SAID OPERATORS AND AIRCRAFT OWNERS SHALL ALSO AVOID FLIGHT OPS
    WITHIN BUFFER ZONE EXTENDED OUT 200NM ALONG UKRAINE RUSSIA BORDER.
    FLIGHT OPS WITHIN CHISHINAU FIR LUUU SHALL ONLY BE UNDERTAKEN
    IN COMPLIANCE WITH AERONAUTICAL PUBLICATIONS
    ISSUED BY REPUBLIC OF MOLDOVA. OPERATORS ARE ALSO REMINDED
    THAT FLIGHT OPS WITHIN MINSK FIR UMMV ARE PROHIBITED  AND
    THAT ADDITIONAL RISK ASSESSMENT AND FLIGHT PLANNING DECISIONS
    SHALL BE TAKEN BEFORE OPERATING IN FIR UUWV, FIR ULLL, FIR USSV,
    FIR UWWW IN ACCORDANCE WITH EASA SAFETY DIRECTIVES

    LIIA-E0187/26
    DU: 29 01 2026 12:23 AU: PERM
    A) LIBB LIRR LIMM
    Q) LIXX / QAFXX / V / NBO / E / 000/999 / 4119N01321E999
    E) THE EQUIPMENT REQUIRED TO OVERFLY THE ITALIAN TERRITORY IN NIGHT
    VFR SHALL INCLUDE AT LEAST:
    - SSR TRANSPONDER MODE A AND C
    - ONE RADIO EQUIPMENT TO MAINTAIN TWO-WAY COMMUNICATION WITH ATS
    UNITS

    REF AIP ENR 1.2-5 (PARAGRAPH ENR 1.2.1.6 'NIGHT VFR' POINT G)

    ARE DESCRIBED CONSISTING OF THE FLW SECTORS, MUENCHEN CTA AND

    OVERHEAD WIEN FIR (LOVV).

    EDMMZUG, EDMMTEG, EDMMTRU AND EDMMSTA ARE NOT AFFECTED.

    AIRCRAFT, OR FOR ANY NON-RUSSIAN-REGISTERED AIRCRAFT WHICH IS
    OWNED OR CHARTERED, OR OTHERWISE CONTROLLED BY ANY

    LAND IN, TAKE OFF FROM OR OVERFLY ITALIAN TERRITORY EXCEPT
    HUMANITARIAN, SAR AND LEASED AIRCRAFT ONE-WAY RETURN-FLIGHTS WITH THE
    PERMISSION OF THE APPROPRIATE ITALIAN AUTHORITIES AND IN CASE OF
    EMERGENCY LANDING OR EMERGENCY OVERFLIGHT.

LSAS FIR SWITZERLAND FIR

    LSSN-A0676/25
    DU: 14 11 2025 12:51 AU: 12 02 2026 23:59 EST
    A) LSAS
    Q) LSAS / QOECH / IV / NBO / E / 000/999 / 4645N00808E999
    E) UKRAINIAN CRISIS
    ALL ACFT AND ALL OPERATORS HOLDING AIR OPERATOR CERTIFICATE (AOC)
    ISSUED BY BELARUSIAN AUTHORITIES PROHIBITED TO USE SWISS AIRPORTS EXC
    WITH PERMISSION OF APPROPRIATE AUTHORITIES OF SWITZERLAND AND IN
    CASE OF EMERG LDG. FLT WITH A VALID DIPLOMATIC CLR NOT AFFECTED.

    LSSN-A0677/25
    DU: 14 11 2025 12:51 AU: 12 02 2026 23:59 EST
    A) LSAS
    Q) LSAS / QOECH / IV / NBO / E / 000/999 / 4645N00808E999
    E) UKRAINIAN CRISIS
    1. ALL AIRCRAFT OWNED, CHARTERED, OPERATED OR OTHERWISE CONTROLLED
    BY CITIZENS OF THE RUSSIAN FEDERATION AND ALL OPERATORS HOLDING AIR
    OPERATOR CERTIFICATE (AOC) ISSUED BY THE RUSSIAN FEDERATION
    AUTHORITIES ARE PROHIBITED TO ENTER, EXIT OR OVERFLY THE
    SWISS AIRSPACE EXC HUMANITARIAN FLT, SEARCH AND RESCUE FLT AND
    LEASED ACFT ONE-WAY RTN FLT WITH THE PERMISSION OF THE APPROPRIATE
    SWISS AUTHORITIES AND IN CASE OF EMERGENCY LDG OR EMERGENCY
    OVERFLIGHT.
    FLIGHTS WITH A VALID DIPLOMATIC CLEARANCE NOT AFFECTED.
    2. AIRCRAFT OPERATORS OF NON-SCHEDULED FLT BETWEEN RUSSIA AND
    SWITZERLAND, OPERATED DIRECTLY OR VIA A THIRD COUNTRY, MUST NOTIFY
    ALL RELEVANT INFORMATION CONCERNING THE FLT PRIOR TO THEIR OPERATION
    AND AT LEAST 48 HR IN ADVANCE TO THE FEDERAL OFFICE OF CIVIL
    AVIATION. CONTACT FOR NOTIFICATION AND DOCUMENTS
    WWW.BAZL.ADMIN.CH/AVIATIONSANCTIONS.

    LSSN-A0678/25
    DU: 14 11 2025 12:51 AU: 12 02 2026 23:59 EST
    A) LSAS
    Q) LSAS / QOECH / IV / NBO / E / 000/999 / 4645N00808E999
    E) SWISS AIR CARRIERS AND COMMANDERS OF AIRCRAFT IN CHARGE OF AIR
    SERVICE MANAGED BY CARRIERS HOLDERS OF OPERATING LICENCE ISSUED BY
    SWITZERLAND, WHETHER THEY ARE CONTRACTUAL CARRIERS AND/OR DE FACTO
    CARRIERS, OR PERFORMING AIR SERVICE WITH COMMERCIAL CHARTER AGREEMENT
    OR WITH CODE SHARING AND TO ALL FLIGHT PERFORMED WITH SWISS AIRCRAFT
    REGISTRATION, ARE REQUESTED TO CONSULT EASA SIB-2021-10 AND ARE
    REQUESTED TO AVOID MINSK FIR (UMMV).
    FOREIGN AIR CARRIERS INBOUND SWITZERLAND ARE RECOMMENDED TO AVOID
    MINSK FIR (UMMV).

    LFFA-A6818/25
    DU: 13 12 2025 00:00 AU: 19 04 2026 23:59
    A) LFLB
    Q) LFMM / QATXX / IV / NBO / AE / 000/115 / 4545N00555E021
    E) FACILITATIONS D'HORAIRES:
    1. FACILITATION HORAIRE EN VIGUEUR SUR L'AEROPORT DE CHAMBERY :
    SAM DIM, 22 26 29 DEC, 02 JAN, 13 20 27 FEV, 06 MAR
    - SE REFERER A L'AIP AD 2 LFLB AD2.23.3 POUR LES MODALITES
    D'APPLICATION.
    - TOUS LES VOLS IFR NECESSITENT L'OBTENTION D'UN NUMERO D'AUTORISATION AUPRES DE L'EXPLOITANT.
    - DEPOT FPL Y A DESTINATION DE LFLB INTERDIT PENDANT LES HORAIRES ATS
    SAUF AERONEFS BASES CAUSE GESTION DES FLUX DE TRAFIC
    - VOLS ENTRAINEMENT IFR DANS LA TMA CHAMBERY INTERDITS
    - VOLS IFR MONOMOTEUR A PISTONS INTERDITS
    - CHAMBERY NE PEUT PAS ETRE CHOISI COMME TERRAIN DE DEROUTEMENT SAUF
    URGENCE DECLAREE.
    - LES APPROCHES AUX INSTRUMENTS SONT RESERVEES AUX AERONEFS A
    DESTINATION DE LFLB SAUF URGENCE DECLAREE.
    - VOLS VFR :
    .LE NOMBRE DE VOLS VFR EST LIMITE EN FONCTION DU TFC CHARTERS SKI.
    .ATTENTE AVANT DE PENETRER L'ESPACE DE CLASSE D.
    .ENTRAINEMENT INTERDIT.
     .VFR NON-BASES : EN RAISON DE LA CAPACITE D'ACCUEIL REDUITE,
    VERIFIER LA DISPONIBILITE STATIONNEMENT AVANT LE VOL EN CONTACTANT
    L'EXPLOITANT UNIQUEMENT PAR E-MAIL : HANDLING(A)CHAMBERY-AIRPORT.COM
    2. EN DEHORS DES JOURS DE FACILITATIONS D'HORAIRES :
    LUN-VEN SAUF: 22 26 29 DEC, 02 JAN, 13 20 27 FEV, 06 MAR
    - OBTENTION D'UN NUMERO D'AUTORISATION AUPRES DE L'EXPLOITANT VIA
    MYHANDLING AU PLUS TARD 48HR A L'AVANCE POUR LES IFR.
    - NUMERO DE CONFIRMATION COMMUNIQUE AU DEMANDEUR PAR L'EXPLOITANT A
    REPORTER EN CASE 18 DU FPL.
    - VOLS D'ENTRAINEMENT IFR DANS LA TMA SOUMIS A AUTORISATION PREALABLE
    DE L'ATC DE CHAMBERY.
    - RISQUE D'ATTENTE POUR LES VFR AVANT AUTORISATION D'INTEGRER
    L'ESPACE DE CLASSE D.
    - AERONEFS NON-BASES (IFR SANS ASSISTANCE ET VFR) : EN RAISON DE LA
    CAPACITE D'ACCUEIL REDUITE, VERIFIER LA DISPONIBILITE DE
    STATIONNEMENT AVANT LE VOL EN CONTACTANT L'EXPLOITANT UNIQUEMENT PAR
    E-MAIL : HANDLING(A)CHAMBERY-AIRPORT.COM

    E) HUMBERSIDE ATZ ACTIVATION AND AD HR AS FOLLOWS:
    THU  1800-1830(PPR), 1900-1940(PPR), 2040-2135(PPR)
    FRI  0600-0630(PPR), 0730-0830, 0900-1530, 1615-1800, 2040-2135(PPR)
    SAT  0600-0630(PPR), 0900-1530, 1615-1800, 1915-1945(PPR),
         2040-2135(PPR)
    SUN  0600-0630(PPR), 0900-1530, 1615-1800, 2040-2135(PPR)
    ATS AVBL DURING ABOVE AD OPR HOURS ONLY. NO ARR OR DEP LATER THAN
    CLOSING TIMES MINUS 15 MINS. INBOUND ACFT ARE REQUIRED TO ALLOW
    SUFFICIENT TIME TO RECEIVE AN ATS AFTER AD REOPENING. SAR OPS OCCUR
    H24, THEREFORE PILOTS TRANSITING THROUGH OR WI THE VICINITY OF THE
    ATZ OUTSIDE OF THE AD OPR HOURS ARE RECOMMENDED TO MAKE BLIND CALLS
    ON THE HUMBERSIDE TOWER CHANNEL 124.905MHZ. USE OF THE AD DURING PPR
    PERIODS IS BY PRIOR ARRANGEMENT THROUGH A HANDLING AGENT OR WITH
    TERMINAL SUPERVISOR ON 07718 524072.

EHEH MILITARY ADMINISTRATION

    EHAM-A2892/25
    DU: 02 12 2025 10:51 AU: 03 03 2026 12:00 EST
    A) EHEH
    Q) EHAA / QCBXX / IV / BO / AE / 000/999 / 5127N00522E005
    E) ADS-B DATA FOR ECRA (EUROPEAN CONNECTED REGIONAL AIRPORTS
    PROGRAMME) OPERATIONS. 1.1.IN ORDER TO COOPERATE WITH ADS-B RECEIVER
    USED BY AIRPORT OPERATOR AND EUROCONTROL FOR USE OF THE ECRA
    PROGRAMME AT EINDHOVEN AIRPORT,PILOTS OF MODE S EQUIPPED ACFT WITH
    ADS-B FUNCTIONALITIES WHEN OPERATING ON THE GROUND SHALL: A)SELECT
    AUTO MODE AND THE ASSIGNED MODE A CODE OR B)IF AUTOMODE IS NOT
    AVAILABLE, SELECT ON (E.G.XPDR) AND THE ASSIGNED MODE A CODE. -FROM
    THE REQUEST FOR TOWER PUSH-BACK OR TAXI,WHICHEVER IS EARLIER -AFTER
    LANDING,CONTINUOUSLY UNTIL THE ACFT IS FULLY PARKED IN ITS STAND.
    -WHEN THE ACFT IS FULLY PARKED, FLT CREW SHALL SELECT STBY.
    1.1.2.WHENEVER THE ACFT IS CAPABLE OF REPORTING ACFT IDENTIFICATION
    (I.E.CALLSIGN USED IN FLT), THIS SHOULD BE ENTERED (THROUGH THE FMS
    OR THE TRANSPONDER CONTROL PANEL) AT THE TIME OF THE REQUEST FOR
    TOWED PUSH-BACK OR TAXI, WHICHEVER IS EARLIER. 1.1.3.AIR CREW MUST
    USE THE ICAO DEFINED FORMAT TO ENTER THE ACFT IDENTIFICATION.
    1.1.4.TO ENSURE THAT THE PERFORMANCE OF SYSTEMS BASED ON SSR FREQ
    (INCLUDING AIRBORNE TCAS AND SSR RADARS) IS NOT COMPROMISED, TCAS
    SHOULD NOT BE SELECTED BEFORE RECEIVING CLEARANCE TO LINE UP, AND
    SHOULD BE DESELECTED AFTER VACATING THE RWY.)
